# Spell Immunity, Greater (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Creature touched

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** Will negates (harmless)

**Spell Resistance:** Yes (harmless)

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 347

This spell functions like *[[Spell Immunity (Spell)|spell immunity]]*, except the immunity applies to spells of 8th level or lower. A creature can have only one *[[Spell Immunity (Spell)|spell immunity]]* or *greater spell immunity* spell in effect on it at a time.
